alert.note: Alert for Carver; Scott; Sibley (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 1:22PM CDT until October 24 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sibley County in central Minnesota... North central Scott County in east central Minnesota... Southern Carver County in east central Minnesota... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 122 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Green Isle, or 24 miles southeast of Hutchinson, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Shakopee, Chaska, Chanhassen, Prior Lake, Victoria, Jordan, Carver, Norwood Young America, Cologne, Green Isle, Hamburg, and Mn Valley State Rec Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
